Key Match Events: Josh Giddey and the Chicago Bulls outlasted Charlotte at the Spectrum Center 115-108 in overtime.
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls ended the year on a two-game winning streak, improving to 15-18 for the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giddey is playing for his next contract as he's set to be a restricted free agent this offseason.
Others: Josh Giddey finished with 14 points, 12 rebounds and six assists as he went 4-for-16 from the floor, making one 3-point shot and four of his free throws, including two with 14 seconds remaining to ice it.
